member_organisations:
R3 represents 3000 individuals in the UK insolvency and restructuring profession. 
 
www.r3.org.uk
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Capital Markets Union; retail financial services; EC Regulation on insolvency; legislation on insolvency.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Co-hosted event in Brussels with ICAEW on Monday 7th December 2015 on 'Insolvency in Europe: Tackling the key obstacles to cross-border markets'
goals__remit: R3 is the trade association for the UK’s insolvency, restructuring, advisory, and turnaround professionals. We represent insolvency practitioners, lawyers, turnaround and restructuring experts, students, and others in the profession.
